title: Paisa-1946-Rossellini-720p-x264-Paisan.mkv
description:
A jewel of a movie that probably doesn't need any introducing (if you do here it is : you need to watch it).
There's only one Blu-Ray version that exists (far as I know), it is hard to find, and only in a huge italian BDRemux version without english subtitles.
Here's a non-compromising HD version (720p) of it, don't get fooled by the size of the file, a lot of work and care came into doing a true to source version of such a reasonable size, in addition some of the scratches, dots etc have been respectfully removed (no miracle, it's still an old source).

English subs included (optional of course).
Audio : AAC 2 Channels.
